wiktionary_senses.definition: A worded or expressed sentence, phrase, or only a word on its own, which asks for information, a reply, or a response; an interrogative.
A subject or topic for consideration or investigation.
A doubt or challenge about the truth, accuracy, or validity of a matter.
A proposal to a meeting as a topic for deliberation.
To ask questions of; to interrogate; to ask for information.
To raise doubts about; have doubts about.
To ask a question or questions; inquire or seek to know; examine.
To argue; to converse; to dispute.
